[[inst_hl_lhu_pr]]
==== HL.LHU.PR

*Syntax:* hl.lhu.pr [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhu_pr.svg[HL.LHU.PR encoding,width=800]
